narrative.narrative: Hola Airlines was a charter airline around from May 15,2002 until February 15,2010. Its main base was Palma de Mallorca with another at Madrid. It operated within Europe mostly. It had a subsidiary from April 2006 to 2009,Gadair European Airlines, which provided ACMI leases for services globally. Hola Airlines fleet was made of three 737-300's at the start,two in 2002 and another in 2003. A few other 737-300's were leased in 2007 and 2008. In 2007 it got a 737-400 and in 2009 another. In 2003 it got a 757-200 and had it untl August 2006 when it leased another one for a year. At the end in 2010 it had the two 737-400's.
